languages.text: {n}Солдат в броне Инквизиции эхом вторит словам Инцендии:{/n} "Лорд-инквизитор не принимает. Однако он повелел уведомить Вашу Светлость, что призовет вас позже, когда это позволят дела".

{n}The soldier wearing Inquisitorial armour echoes Incendia's words:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} cannot see the Lord Inquisitor now. However, he bade to inform Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} that he will summon you later, when circumstances permit."
languages.original_text: {n}Солдат в броне Инквизиции эхом вторит словам Инцендии:{/n} "Лорд-инквизитор не принимает. Однако он повелел уведомить Вашу Светлость, что призовет вас позже, когда это позволят дела".

traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: {n}身穿审判庭护甲的士兵应和着因森蒂娅的话。{/n}“您现在不能与大审判官见面，大人。不过，他要我转告大人您，他稍后会在情况允许时与您见面。”
languages.original_text: {n}The soldier wearing Inquisitorial armour echoes Incendia's words:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} cannot see the Lord Inquisitor now. However, he bade to inform Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} that he will summon you later, when circumstances permit."

traits.locale_text: {n}身穿审判庭护甲的士兵应和着因森蒂娅的话。{/n}“您现在不能与审判长见面，大人。不过，他要我转告大人您，他稍后会在情况允许时与您见一面。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: {n}異端審問官の鎧をまとった戦士は、インセンディアの言葉を繰り返した。{/n}「現在、陛下はロード・インクィジターのお会いすることは出来ません。ですが状態が整い次第、陛下をお呼びするとお伝えするようにとのことでした」
languages.original_text: {n}The soldier wearing Inquisitorial armour echoes Incendia's words:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} cannot see the Lord Inquisitor now. However, he bade to inform Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} that he will summon you later, when circumstances permit."

traits.locale_text: {n}異端審問官の鎧をまとった戦士は、インセンディアの言葉を繰り返した。{/n}「現在、陛下はロード・インクィジターのお会いすることは出来ません。ですが状態が整い次第、陛下をお呼びするとお伝えするようにとのことでした」
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: {n}El guerrero con armadura inquisitorial se hace eco de las palabras de Incendia:{/n} «{mf|Milord|Milady} no puede ver al Lord Inquisidor ahora. Sin embargo, me ha pedido que {mf|le|la} informe de que le convocará más tarde, cuando las circunstancias lo permitan».
languages.original_text: {n}The soldier wearing Inquisitorial armour echoes Incendia's words:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} cannot see the Lord Inquisitor now. However, he bade to inform Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} that he will summon you later, when circumstances permit."

traits.locale_text: {n}El guerrero con armadura inquisitorial se hace eco de las palabras de Incendia:{/n} «{mf|Milord|Milady} no puede ver al Lord Inquisidor ahora. Sin embargo, me ha pedido que {mf|le|la} informe de que le convocará más tarde, cuando las circunstancias se lo permitan».
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: {n}Der Soldat in der Rüstung der Inquisition wiederholt Incendias Worte:{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} kann den Großinquisitor im Augenblick nicht sehen. Er lässt Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} jedoch ausrichten, dass er Euch später zu sich rufen wird, sobald die Umstände dies erlauben."
languages.original_text: {n}The soldier wearing Inquisitorial armour echoes Incendia's words:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} cannot see the Lord Inquisitor now. However, he bade to inform Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} that he will summon you later, when circumstances permit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Soldat in der Rüstung der Inquisition wiederholt Incendias Worte:{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} kann den Großinquisitor im Augenblick nicht sehen. Er lässt Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} jedoch ausrichten, dass er Euch später zu sich rufen wird, sobald die Umstände dies erlauben."
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: {n}Le soldat en armure de l'Inquisition fait écho aux paroles d'Incendia :{/n} « Vous ne pouvez pas rencontrer le seigneur inquisiteur pour le moment, Votre Seigneurie. Toutefois, il m'a dit de vous informer qu'il vous fera mander ultérieurement, quand les circonstances le permettront. »
languages.original_text: {n}The soldier wearing Inquisitorial armour echoes Incendia's words:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} cannot see the Lord Inquisitor now. However, he bade to inform Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} that he will summon you later, when circumstances permit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le soldat en armure de l'Inquisition fait écho aux paroles d'Incendia :{/n} « Vous ne pouvez pas rencontrer le seigneur inquisiteur pour le moment, Votre Seigneurie. Toutefois, il m'a dit de vous informer qu'il vous fera mander ultérieurement, quand les circonstances le lui permettront. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent

languages.text: {n}Engizisyon zırhı giyen asker, İncendia'nın sözlerini destekliyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri şu an Lord Engizisyoncu'yu göremezler. Ancak durum el verdiği zaman onu çağıracağı hususunda {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ni bilgilendirmemi istedi."
languages.original_text: {n}The soldier wearing Inquisitorial armour echoes Incendia's words:{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} cannot see the Lord Inquisitor now. However, he bade to inform Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} that he will summon you later, when circumstances permit."

traits.locale_text: {n}Engizisyon zırhı giyen asker, İncendia'nın sözlerini destekliyor:{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri şu an Lord Engizisyoncu'yu göremezler. Ancak durum el verdiği zaman onu çağıracağı konusunda {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ni bilgilendirmemi istedi."
traits.speaker: Footfall_InquisitorAgent
